## Appendix C Transportable Heavy Ions

This appendix lists those heavy ions, by target identifier [ยง1.2.2] in
ZAID format, that can be transported.

Z = 2 , Helium

2005, 2006, 2007, 2008

Z = 3 , Lithium

3005, 3006, 3007, 3008, 3009, 3010, 3011
